name: Touhou Tsuki No Seinaru Youhishi - Holy Parchment of Moon!
name_original: Touhou Tsuki No Seinaru Youhishi - Holy Parchment of Moon!
description:
Touhou Tsuki No Seinaru Youhishi - Holy Parchment of Moon!

On a midnight full moon Kaguya heard the sound of mountains being demolished. She found that very strange.
A strange fairy told Kaguya that this is likely to be a preparation for a mysterious volcanic eruption. The strange ice fairy said she tried to visit the mentioned volcano but she doesn't know where it is.
So Kaguya decides to leave Eientei in search of this volcano.
Eirin ordered Reisen to go with Kaguya for better protection and ordered her to find the 12 Parchments of the moon that will show the way to reach this mysterious volcano.

How to play:
Z = jump
Z on air = "MOON PLAN"
X = shoot
C = "GRAVITY SEAL"

(And sorry for my English, because I'm using Google Translate XD)
